questions.question: What is History?

choices.answer: Is a way for us to no repeat mistakes from the past.
Is discipline that recollects events from the past.
Is a Science that studies the historical processes.
All of the above

questions.question: What are the basic tools of historians?

choices.answer: The books from the past
Primary & Secondary Sources
The Historical Record
None of the above

questions.question: Who was Otto von Bismarck?

choices.answer: The main leader of Germany during WWI
The main character of the German Unification Process
The person who proposed the division of Africa
The mentor of Adolf Hitler

questions.question: What was the Berlin Conference?

choices.answer: An agreement that divided Africa among European Nations.
A Peace Conference that prevented the beginning of WWI.
The Central peace Agreement after WWI.
The final event that led to WWI.

questions.question: The XX century goes from:

choices.answer: 1st of January of 2000 to the 31 of December of 2100.
1st of January of 1900 to the 31 of December of 2000.
1st of January of 1800 to the 31 of December of 1900.
1st of January of 1700 to the 31 of December of 1800.

questions.question: How many World Wars were fought in the XX Century?

choices.answer: One long war with an interruption of 20 years.
Two wars that ender with the defeat of Germany in both cases
Three wars: WWI, WWII and the Cold War.
Four Wars: WWI, WWII, Cold War and the War against Terrorism

questions.question: What was the Cold War?

choices.answer: A War that came after WWI.
A War that came after WWII.
A War fought during the 1960 terrible Winter.
A War that never confronted the rival sides directly.

questions.question: What is a Political Spectrum?

choices.answer: A way of understanding disputes of rich and poor in politics
A theory that explains the oscillations from left to Right.
A rare phenomenon that explains wars among oposite parties.
All of the answers.
